mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pbi ( pbi.acca_id, pbi.back_date, pbi.back_money, pbi.back_status, pbi.pay_no, pbi.pbi_id, pbi.plant_account, pbi.return_no, pbi.start_date ) VALUES ( #{pbi.accaId}, #{pbi.backDate}, #{pbi.backMoney}, #{pbi.backStatus}, #{pbi.payNo}, #{pbi.pbiId}, #{pbi.plantAccount}, #{pbi.returnNo}, #{pbi.startDate} )
